text: Alloh taolo mefarmojad: "Imrūz rūzest, ki rostii rostgūjon ʙa onon sud meʙaxşad. Onon ʙoƣhoe [dar ʙihişt] dorand, ki çūjʙorho az zeri [daraxtoni] on çorī ast va to aʙad çovidona dar on memonand. Alloh taolo az [a'moli] onon xuşnud ast va onon [niz] az [podoşi] Ū xuşnudand. In hamon rastagorii ʙuzurg ast
